message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that is of exceptional value, and I believe it could be a game-changer for you.  While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me. I'm confident that it will be even more valuable to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a price that reflects both the value of the product and the potential it holds for your success. What do you say?
